com.hms_networks.americas.sc.thingworx

Class TWApiManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hms_networks.americas.sc.thingworx.TWApiManager

  • public class TWApiManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for managing HTTP API calls to the Thingworx API.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    HMS Networks, MU Americas Solution Center

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static java.util.ArrayList pendingDataPoints
      Array list of data points that are waiting to be sent to Thingworx.

      TWApiManager()

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void addDataPointToPending(DataPoint dataPoint)
      Adds the specified data point to the list of data points to be sent to Thingworx.
      private static void buildDataPointsJson(java.lang.StringBuffer stringBuffer)
      Builds the JSON array of data points and appends it to the specified string buffer.
      static java.lang.String getApiDeviceName()
      Gets the name of the Ewon Flexy as it appears/should appear in Thingworx.
      static java.lang.String httpPost(java.lang.String url, java.lang.String header, java.lang.String body)
      Performs an HTTP POST requests to the specified URL using the specified request header and body.
      private static void sendJsonToThingworx(java.lang.String json)
      Sends the specified JSON string to the Thingworx Flexy TakeInfo endpoint as an HTTP POST request
      static void sendPendingToThingworx()
      Builds a payload containing the data points that are pending and sends them to Thingworx.

        Since:

      • sendPendingToThingworx

        public static void sendPendingToThingworx()
        Builds a payload containing the data points that are pending and sends them to Thingworx. This task is performed on a thread that is spawned to avoid an overload of the main thread.
        Since:
        1.1

      • httpPost

        public static java.lang.String httpPost(java.lang.String url,
                                        java.lang.String header,
                                        java.lang.String body)
                                 throws com.ewon.ewonitf.EWException,
                                        java.io.IOException
        Performs an HTTP POST requests to the specified URL using the specified request header and body.
        Parameters:
        url - URL to make request
        header - request header
        body - request body
        Throws:
        com.ewon.ewonitf.EWException - if unable to make POST request
        java.io.IOException
        Since:
        1.1
